text: The Renunciation is a 1909 American silent movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe RenunciationTHE RENUNCIATION and stars Mary Pickford, Anthony O'Sullivan, and James Kirkwood. ==Actors== *Mary Pickford - Kittie Ryan *Anthony O'Sullivan - Steve Ryan, Kittie's Uncle *James Kirkwood - Joe Fielding *Harry Solter - Sam Walters *Billy Quirk - Kittie's Fiance *Edwin August *Arthur V. Johnson *Wilfred Lucas *W. Chrystie Miller ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American silent movies Category:Short movies Category:1909 movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Renunciation
